title: 3.99ct Diamond Inside-Out Hoop Earrings
description: Diamond inside-out hoop earrings with 36 round Natural Diamonds totalling 3.99ct (Estimated grading: H-I SI). Back of the hoop has the Diamonds set inside the hoop. 14ct yellow gold. Diameter: 25mm. Hoop width: 3.0mm. Weight: 6.5g. With Valuation Certificate #421812. (New).
